Russia: Revolution and Civil War, 19171921 is a history of the Russian Revolution and Civil War, written by Antony Beevor and published by Viking Press and Weidenfeld & Nicolson in 2022 in a hardback edition and by Tantor Audio as an audiobook.
Reviews
* Anthony, A. (5 June 2022) [https://www.theguardian.com/books/2022/jun/05/russia-revolution-and-civil-war-1917-1921-antony-beevor-review Russia: Revolution and Civil War 1917-1921 by Antony Beevor review – butchery of the Bolsheviks]. The Guardian.
* Beer, D. (15 June 2022) [https://www.newstatesman.com/culture/books/2022/06/russia-revolution-and-civil-war-1917-1921-antony-beevor-review What Antony Beevor gets wrong about Russia]. The New Statesman.
* Kelly, C. (23 May 2022) [https://www.ft.com/content/abd73cac-f7f5-49b3-9ec9-72caf85686a1 Russia: Revolution and Civil War by Antony Beevor]. The Financial Times.
* Lieven, D. (3 June 2022) [https://www.the-tls.co.uk/articles/russia-revolution-and-civil-war-1917-1921-antony-beevor-book-review-dominic-lieven/ Divided they fell: Bolshevik unity enabled victory over the Whites]. The Times Literary Supplement.
* Staff, (3 June 2022) [https://www.theweek.co.uk/arts-life/culture/books/956949/russia-revolution-civil-war-1917-1921-antony-beevor-review Russia: Revolution and Civil War 1917-1921 by Antony Beevor – a ‘grimly magnificent’ book]. The Week.
